about_the_game:
Art Spotting Co-op is a casual game about spotting the difference between several art pieces together with a friend while listening to relaxing music. A controller is not required for local co-op play.

Gameplay

2 players will work together to spot the differences between left and right art on the screen. Player 1 will control the cursor using the mouse and player 2 will control another cursor using the keyboard.

Features

  • A casual, simple and relaxing game

  • Several beautiful western, eastern and modern art pieces

  • All art pieces are family-friendly

  • Each art is accompanied with their own music

  • 2-player local co-op using only a mouse and a keyboard (no controller required)

  • Autosaves and autoloads
